DOC.brief_title: Corneal Staining Associated With Daily Disposable Beauty Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . 2 . Fluency English ability read understand write English . 3 . The subject must able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 4 . The subject must 18 35 year age . 5 . The subject must adapt ( minimum 4 week history daily wear prior baseline study visit ) soft contact lens wearer eye . 6 . The subject must East Southeast Asia descent , e.g . ethnic Chinese , Japanese , Korean , Malay , Vietnamese , Indonesian , Filipino , etc . selfreport . 7 . The subject must come current ( 12 month old ) spectacle contact lens prescription indicate . ( NB : Emmetropic subject wear contact lens enhancement purpose also require current contact lens prescription ) . 8 . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range PLANO 6.00 Diopter ( D ) eye . 9 . The subject must best correct visual acuity +0.24 logMAR ( equivalent 20/30 ( 2 ) ) good eye . 10 . The subject must wearable pair spectacle ( indicated current prescription ) wear visit include screen visit require vision correction . They must willing wear spectacle 24 hour washout period lead treatment visit ( NB : Emmetropic subject spectacle must agree lens wear visit day include screen visit ) . 11 . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . 1 . Are currently pregnant lactating , determine selfreport ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Have ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Have systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . This may include , may limit diabetes , hyperthyroidism , recurrent herpes simplex/zoster , Sjogren 's syndrome , xerophthalmia , acne rosacea , StevensJohnson syndromes . 4 . Use topical medication eye drop ointment . 5 . Have entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia . 6 . Had previous , plan , ocular intraocular surgery ( e.g. , cataract surgery , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) . 7 . Have grade 3.0 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) Efron classification scale ocular abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . 8 . Have know hypersensitivity allergic reaction contact lenses ( assessed ocular history ) . 9 . Have ocular infection . 10 . Have corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 11 . Have participate contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 14 day prior study enrollment . 12 . Have infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) , selfreport . 13 . Currently wear contact lenes extend wear basis . 14 . Is employee investigational clinic ( e.g. , Investigator , Coordinator , Technician ) . 15 . Currently wear toric multifocal contact lens . If subject wear soft contact lenses monovision , must willing wear distance correction eye study .
